Deep within the crimson demense of the Minions of Unicron, Vorpral,
lord of the minions in this area sat upon his throne, shadows casting
themselves across his form like some dark claws across his massive
frame. 

From the darkness Vorpal's slitted optics observed the viewscreen
before him as he smiled to himself. "Indeed." He intoned, a note of
mirth coating his word as he watched events unfold. 

From his vantage point Vorpal knew that Cyclonus should nearly be to
Earth, and from the sensors readings he had been recieving it was no
doubt that Cyclonus had to know that the Predacon base that held the
form of Rodimus was already under attack. it would make his work so
much easier.

With a slight turn of his head Vorpral could also see the other
minions, or atleast where they should be, on thier way to the ark. A
slight energy signature told him the the Maximals were already in route
as well. It would be a race to the finish.

Reaching out a clawed hand Vorpral opened a communication channel,
"Krytek, how are the experiments proceeding."

"Sir." came the swift reply. "The experiment is a 87% completion. All
results appear positive."

"Good. Keep me advised. Vorpal out." He chuckled again, perhaps that
intruder would serve a useful pupose after all. Soon he would have his
own set of warriors stronger and more resilient then sweeps - then
perhaps Unicron would not need Cyclonus. Vorpral brooded darkly. But
then again there are always good uses to put wariors to. 

Vorpal finally turned to the image of Unicron that had been standing
inert in the center of his throne room. While Vorpal was ever loyal to
the dark diety, having him sit there so close was always unerving. 

"Lord Unicron." Vorpal spoke finally to the image of Unicron, "All is
nearing readiness. The Maximals are without the Matrix and the Pedicons
are about to be other wise engaged and the original holder of the
Matrix will be destroyed." Vorpal chuckled, "What is your desire lord?"

((OOC: Airly I sent you some Private Email))

Preston
(Da'minion)
